## ğŸ“– Isi

- ğŸ§® wuru-in ** Statistics na Mathtisility 4*
- ğŸ“Š mfe iji ***

Ndeká» ##

### ğŸ“Š Satlilization Visual
- Charmar Charts: kehoraizin & Vetikal (`hbar`, `vbar`)  
- Ahá»‹a nkesa: meká»lá» á»Œrá»¥ (`histo`), igbe akwá»¥kwá» (`boxplot`), kde fots (`kdeplot`)  
- Atá»¥matá»¥: violin, violin, warara  
- Nyocha Nchá»‹ká»ta: Heatmaps Ï€35_, Worff foots (`scatter`)  
- Nlele dá»‹ elu: Ntinye / nkwonkwo á»¥kwá»¥, usoro nyocha  
- Tebá»¥l data: tebá»¥l tebá»¥l kpá»¥rá»¥ akpá»¥ (`table`)  

### ğŸ“ˆ Nnyocha Statistical
- ** Central Sendy ** : pá»¥tara (`get_media`), median (`get_median`), á»ná»dá»¥ Ï€30_  
- ** Mgbasa ** : GAG (`get_rank`), ngbanwe (`get_var`), á»ká»lá»tá» (`get_desv`)  
- ** Nnyocha ** : Mgbasa Ozi (`disp`), IQR GLá»ŒRá»Œ, Nhazi, Mgbanwe á»Œsá»  
- ** Nchá»pá»¥ta ihe ngosi ** : IQR na Z-Scorezá»

### Station Statistics
Î _12_

###
```python
import helper as hp

df = hp.pd.DataFrame({"values": [5, 3, 7, 2, 9]})
hp.histo(df, "values", bins=5, title="Sample Histogram")
```

### Njikwa faili
```python
from helper import call

data = call(name="my_data", type="csv")  # Finds and loads a CSV file automatically
```

Nsá»¥ghará»‹ ### Nsá»¥ghará»‹
Î _9_

### Syntax
```python
from helper import run

run("./path/to/my_script.py")
#Show gui pop up with results
```
